languages.text: Дракон — командир в иерархии кабала друкари, возглавляющий самые сложные и опасные рейды в реальный мир. Достигшие этой позиции обладают незаурядными боевыми {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантами{/g} и достаточными жестокостью и хитростью, чтобы сохранять свою позицию и жизнь.

A Dracon is a commander within the hierarchy of a Drukhari Kabal who leads the most audacious raids into realspace. Those who rise to this status are known for their remarkable combat {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and are cruel and cunning enough to keep both their position and their life.
languages.original_text: Дракон — командир в иерархии кабала друкари, возглавляющий самые сложные и опасные рейды в реальный мир. Достигшие этой позиции обладают незаурядными боевыми {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантами{/g} и достаточными жестокостью и хитростью, чтобы сохранять свою позицию и жизнь.

traits.locale_text: A Dracon is a commander within the hierarchy of a Drukhari Kabal who leads the most audacious raids into realspace. Those who rise to this status are known for their remarkable combat talents and are cruel and cunning enough to keep both their position and life.

A Dracon is a commander within the hierarchy of a Drukhari Kabal who leads the most audacious raids into realspace. Those who rise to this status are known for their remarkable combat {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and are cruel and cunning enough to keep both their position and their life.

A Dracon is a commander within the hierarchy of a Drukhari Kabal who leads the most audacious raids into realspace. Those who rise to this status are known for their remarkable combat {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and are cruel and cunning enough to keep both their position and their life.

languages.text: Ein Dracon ist ein Kommandant innerhalb der Hierarchie einer Drukhari-Kabale, der die verwegensten Überfälle im Realraum anführt. Wer in diesen Status aufsteigt, der ist für seine erstaunlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} im Kampf bekannt und ist grausam und gerissen genug, um sowohl seine Position als auch sein Leben zu behalten.
languages.original_text: A Dracon is a commander within the hierarchy of a Drukhari Kabal who leads the most audacious raids into realspace. Those who rise to this status are known for their remarkable combat {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and are cruel and cunning enough to keep both their position and their life.

traits.locale_text: Ein Dracon ist ein Kommandant innerhalb der Hierarchie einer Drukhari-Kabale, der die verwegensten Überfälle im Realraum anführt. Wer in diesen Status aufsteigt, der ist für seine erstaunlichen Fähigkeiten im Kampf bekannt und ist grausam und gerissen genug, um sowohl seine Position als auch sein Leben zu behalten.

languages.text: Dans la hiérarchie d'une Kabale drukhari, un dracon est un commandant qui mène les raids les plus audacieux dans l'espace réel. Ceux qui parviennent à obtenir ce statut sont généralement connus pour leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} au combat, mais également pour leur cruauté et leur ruse, qui leur permettent de conserver leur rang... et leur vie.
languages.original_text: A Dracon is a commander within the hierarchy of a Drukhari Kabal who leads the most audacious raids into realspace. Those who rise to this status are known for their remarkable combat {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and are cruel and cunning enough to keep both their position and their life.

traits.locale_text: Dans la hiérarchie d'une Kabale drukhari, un dracon est un commandant qui mène les raids les plus audacieux dans l'espace réel. Ceux qui parviennent à obtenir ce statut sont généralement connus pour leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} au combat, mais également pour leur cruauté et leur ruse, qui leur permettent de conserver leur rang... et leur vie.

languages.text: Un Dracón es un comandante en la jerarquía de una Kábala Drukhari que lidera las incursiones más audaces al espacio real. Quienes alcanzan este estatus destacan por sus notables {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} para el combate y son lo bastante crueles y astutos como para conservar su posición y su vida.
languages.original_text: A Dracon is a commander within the hierarchy of a Drukhari Kabal who leads the most audacious raids into realspace. Those who rise to this status are known for their remarkable combat {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and are cruel and cunning enough to keep both their position and their life.

traits.locale_text: Un Dracón es un comandante en la jerarquía de una Kábala Drukhari que lidera las incursiones más audaces al espacio real. Quienes alcanzan este estatus destacan por sus notables talentos para el combate y son lo bastante crueles y astutos como para conservar su posición y su vida.

languages.text: 裁决官是黑暗灵族阴谋团的指挥官，负责指挥阴谋团成员袭击真实世界。能够爬到这个阶级的人，无一例外都拥有着非凡的战斗才能，而且极为狡猾、残忍。只有这样，才能在阴谋的游戏中保住自己的地位与性命。{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}{/g}
languages.original_text: A Dracon is a commander within the hierarchy of a Drukhari Kabal who leads the most audacious raids into realspace. Those who rise to this status are known for their remarkable combat {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and are cruel and cunning enough to keep both their position and their life.

traits.locale_text: 裁决官是黑暗灵族阴谋团的指挥官，负责指挥阴谋团成员袭击真实世界。能够爬到这个阶级的人，无一例外都拥有着非凡的战斗才能，而且极为狡猾、残忍。只有这样，才能在阴谋的游戏中保住自己的地位与性命。

languages.text: ドラコンは、デュカーリ陰謀団階層内の司令。最も大規模なリアルスペースへの襲撃を指揮している。この地位まで上り詰めた者は卓越した戦闘{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}を持ち、地位と命を両方維持できるほどの、残酷さとずる賢さを持ち合わせている。
languages.original_text: A Dracon is a commander within the hierarchy of a Drukhari Kabal who leads the most audacious raids into realspace. Those who rise to this status are known for their remarkable combat {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and are cruel and cunning enough to keep both their position and their life.

traits.locale_text: ドラコンは、デュカーリ陰謀団階層内の司令。最も大規模なリアルスペースへの襲撃を指揮している。この地位まで上り詰めた者は卓越した戦闘能力を持ち、地位と命を両方維持できるほどの、残酷さとずるさを持ち合わせている。

languages.text: Drakon, bir Drukhari Kabalı hiyerarşisi içinde gerçekuzaya yapılan en cüretkâr akınları yöneten komutandır. Bu rütbeye yükselenler olağanüstü savaş {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}becerileri{/g} ile nam salmıştır ve hem mevkilerini hem de canlarını koruyacak kadar zalim ve kurnazdırlar.
languages.original_text: A Dracon is a commander within the hierarchy of a Drukhari Kabal who leads the most audacious raids into realspace. Those who rise to this status are known for their remarkable combat {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} and are cruel and cunning enough to keep both their position and their life.
